tr.td: The most important treatment that can be given to a patient with Ebola to help them survive is? 1)Fluids 2)Antibiotics 3)Antivirals 4)Anti-pyretics/Anti-fever medications 5)There is no care that has been found to increase survival of patients with Ebola

contentString.value: The most important treatment that can be given to a patient with Ebola to help them survive is? 1)Fluids 2)Antibiotics 3)Antivirals 4)Anti-pyretics/Anti-fever medications 5)There is no care that has been found to increase survival of patients with Ebola
